name: EternaLantern
description:
[WEBGL HAS GAME BREAKING BUG ABOUT 2 MINUTES IN]

I left the WebGL build up so you can get an idea of the game, if you would like to play the rest it's fully playable with the Windows build that is downloadable below! (Sorry you'll have to ALT + F4 to Exit it)

Thanks!

A game by Dylan North

Made for Lost Relic Games Game Jam

Developed over a dark and sleepless week with the theme of Connection, I hope the experience gives you hint at what something much bigger based in this world could feel like. No guarantees for a bug-less pain-free experience and It's little stark on sound and settings.
